actions.delete_playlist_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist?
actions.confirm_reset_preferences: Are you sure you want to reset your preferences?
actions.no_valid_playlists: No valid playlists inside the file!
actions.instances_not_shown: This build of Piped only works with our personal instance and there is no option to select other instances.

tooltips.theme: Select dark, light, or auto theme for the UI
tooltips.country_selection: Select your country/region to show local content
tooltips.default_homepage: Default page when visiting the site (trending or feed)
tooltips.autoplay_video: Automatically play videos after page loads
tooltips.auto_display_captions: Auto display captions on videos that have captions
tooltips.autoplay_next_countdown: Time countdown before playing next video (in seconds)
tooltips.audio_only: Audio only playback - useful when bandwidth is expensive
tooltips.prefer_hls: Try this if you are having playback issues
tooltips.default_quality: Default video quality that will be selected
tooltips.buffering_goal: Amount of video to preload ahead to ensure smooth playback
tooltips.minimize_comments_default: Minimize the comments section by default
tooltips.minimize_description_default: Minimize the video description section by default
tooltips.minimize_recommendations_default: Minimize the recommendations section by default
tooltips.minimize_chapters_default: Minimize the video chapters section by default
tooltips.chapters_layout_mobile: Chapters layout on mobile devices (horizontal or vertical)
tooltips.show_watch_on_youtube: Show the watch on YouTube button next to videos
tooltips.show_search_suggestions: Show search suggestions as you type
tooltips.store_search_history: Store your search history in the browser
tooltips.store_watch_history: Store watched videos in your history
tooltips.hide_watched: Hide videos you have already watched
tooltips.enabled_codecs: Supported codecs for video playback (multiple selection)
tooltips.disable_lbry: Disable LBRY streams (might make video loading faster)
tooltips.enable_lbry_proxy: Enable LBRY proxy for regions where it's blocked
tooltips.concurrent_prefetch_limit: Number of streams that prefetch simultaneously
tooltips.enable_sponsorblock: Enable automatic skipping of sponsor segments in videos
tooltips.show_markers: Show markers on time bar to jump between sections
tooltips.min_segment_length: Minimum length of a segment to be skippable (in seconds)
tooltips.skip_sponsors: Automatically skip sponsored segments of the video
tooltips.skip_intro: Automatically skip intro/montage segments of the video
tooltips.skip_outro: Automatically skip outro/credit segments of the video
tooltips.skip_preview: Automatically skip preview/recap segments of the video
tooltips.skip_interaction: Automatically skip like subscribe reminder segments of the video
tooltips.skip_self_promo: Automatically skip self promotion segments of the video
tooltips.skip_non_music: Automatically skip non-music segments in music videos
tooltips.skip_highlight: Automatically skip the highlight segment of the video
tooltips.skip_filler_tangent: Automatically skip the filler tangent segments of the video
tooltips.enable_dearrow: Use improved titles and thumbnails from DeArrow
tooltips.delete_account: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
tooltips.logout: Log out of your account on this device
tooltips.invalidate_session: Log out of your account on all devices
tooltips.show_alert_on_disliked_videos: Show an alert when you watch a video you disliked

player.failed: Failed with code {0}. See logs for more details.

info.preferences_note: Note: Preferences are stored in your browser's local storage. Clearing your browser's data will reset your preferences.
info.local_storage: This option requires localStorage, are cookies enabled?
info.login_note: Log in with an account created on this instance.
info.register_note: Create an account on this Piped instance. This will allow you to sync subscriptions and playlists with your account on the instance. You can use the service without an account, but all data will be stored in your browser's local storage. Please make sure not to use an email as your username, and to choose a secure password that you don't use elsewhere.
info.register_no_email_note: Using an email instead of a username is discouraged. Continue?
info.history_desc: Your watched videos will appear here. Enable watch history in preferences to save your viewing history.
info.no_videos_in_history: You have not watched any videos yet.
info.confirm_delete_all_likes: Are you sure you want to remove all liked videos?
info.title: Title
info.confirm_delete_all_dislikes: Are you sure you want to remove all disliked videos?
info.log_user_activity_description: Record your activities in browser for display in user dashboard
info.restore_warning: This will replace all your current data with the backup data.
info.backup_restore_note: Make sure to use valid and trusted files.
info.backup_all_description: Includes subscriptions, history, likes, dislikes, and preferences
info.theme_description: Dark theme: suitable for low-light environments / Light theme: suitable for well-lit environments
info.homepage_description: The page you are directed to upon entering the site
info.quality_description: Default video quality chosen when opening videos
info.speed_description: Default video playback speed when starting
info.autoplay_description: Automatically play the next video when the current video ends
info.minimize_comments_description: Shows comments in a collapsed state by default
info.watch_history_description: Stores videos you have watched in your browser
info.search_history_description: Stores your search queries in your browser
info.hide_watched_description: Hides videos you have already watched from view
info.enabled_codecs_description: Select multiple options by holding the Ctrl key (or Cmd on Mac) and clicking. Active codecs are used for video playback.
info.chapter_layout_description: How video chapters are displayed in the mobile version
info.clear_subscriptions_description: Removes all subscriptions from your list.
info.clear_likes_description: Removes all liked videos from your list.
info.clear_dislikes_description: Removes all disliked videos from your list.
info.reset_all_data_description: This will clear all subscriptions, history, likes, dislikes, and preferences.
info.reset_preferences_description: Resets all custom settings to default values.
info.logs_info_text: Your activity is stored in your browser, not on our server. You can back up this data.
info.privacy_policy_note: Note that your activity is stored only in your browser, not on our server
info.user_logs_saved_locally: Your activity data is saved locally in your browser, not on our server.
info.confirm_clear_subscriptions: Are you sure you want to clear all subscriptions?
info.confirm_clear_history: Are you sure you want to clear watch history?
info.confirm_clear_likes: Are you sure you want to clear all liked videos?
info.confirm_clear_dislikes: Are you sure you want to clear all disliked videos?
info.confirm_clear_all_logs: Are you sure you want to clear all activity logs? This action cannot be undone!
info.confirm_reset_all_data: Are you sure you want to reset all data? This action cannot be undone!
info.confirm_reset_preferences: Are you sure you want to reset preferences?
info.danger_zone_warning: Some dangerous settings are accessible in the "Delete Data" section. Be careful! If deleted, recovery is not possible.
info.data_management_description: To backup and restore all user data, go to the "Backup" section.
info.backup_instructions_1: 1. Click the backup button to create a backup
info.backup_instructions_2: 2. Click the import button to restore data and select your backup file
info.backup_instructions_3: 3. Data is stored locally in your browser
info.backup_instructions_4: 4. Data will be in JSON format

comment.user_disabled: Comments have been disabled in settings.
